files.emptyHint: Pick a folder to start AI-powered renaming
files.tooMany: Too many files, loaded first {{max}} of {{total}}

welcome.title: Welcome to Fyla
welcome.subtitle: AI-powered smart file renaming
welcome.step1Desc: Works with local Ollama or any OpenAI-compatible API
welcome.step2Desc: Auto-categorize sorts renamed files into subfolders by type
welcome.step3Desc: Fyla can auto-watch a folder and rename new files as they appear
welcome.step4Desc: All set! Drop files or wait for new files in your watch folder — Fyla will rename them automatically.
welcome.watchOptional: This step is optional. You can configure it later in Settings.

empty.title: Drop files here to rename
empty.subtitle: Supports PDF · Word · PPT · Excel · TXT · Markdown · JPG · PNG · HEIC · WebP · TIFF

settings.customRulesHint: Tell the AI how to name files, e.g. use "client-doctype-date" format
settings.customRulesPlaceholder: e.g. Use English, format as "vendor-invoice-date", date as YYYY-MM-DD, no spaces
settings.enableVlmHint: Prefer vision model for image files
settings.reuseLlmHint: Use the same model and key as AI Provider
settings.watchFolderHint: Auto-analyze new files (e.g. your Downloads folder)
settings.autoCategorizeHint: Auto-sort files into subfolders by type (Images / Documents / PDFs / Archives)
settings.enableWatchHint: Auto-watch for new files in the folder
settings.setWatchFirst: Please set a watch folder first

errors.ollamaNotRunning: Ollama is not running. Run "ollama serve" in terminal
errors.ollamaConnFailed: Cannot connect to Ollama. Check the URL in Settings
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Model may be too large or network issue
errors.unauthorized: Authentication failed. Check your API Key
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Try again later
errors.serverError: AI service error. Try again later
errors.modelNotFound: Model not found. Check the model name in Settings
errors.fileExists: A file with the same name already exists
errors.fileNotFound: Source file has been moved or deleted
errors.pdfExtractFailed: Failed to extract PDF content. File may be corrupted or encrypted
errors.emptyFilename: AI could not extract useful info. Try renaming manually

updater.checkFailed: Update check failed, try again later
